1213.title: Someone else

choices: A huge Victorian galleon
A decommissioned navy destroyer, patched up and refitted
An old cargo ship, fitted top to bottom with improvised weapons
12131.content:
Simone smiled, looking at her phone. This guy was certainly a character. A self-proclaimed pirate, he even put some of that corny pirate-speak in his texts to her. What was more interesting is his claims to have his own ship to sail the world and a desire for a strong woman by his side. Something exotic and dangerous, so why not a human? It made Simone feel a strange kind of special. It helped that he was quite easy on the eyes too. Handsome, tall, muscular. The thick, bristly fur and hyena-like muzzle were there too, of course. But the gnoll was a sexy beast in her mind.

Finally her attention was drawn to the front door, loud knocking echoing through her house. They had agreed before the date that she'd be wearing something casual. Something that she didn't mind getting damaged or wet. Those instructions alone had her fantasizing about what this Seafang might do to her in the bedroom, or captain's quarters as he'd said. More knocks followed as it seemed her date was an impatient one. She opened the door to find several gnolls waiting for her. None of them looked like the dashing one she'd been getting pictures from though.

"Good evening, madam." The lead gnoll spoke with a growly voice. English did not come easy to the beast, but it tried to sound polite all the same. More distressing was the smell. She had few illusions about gnolls being clean, but the piercing stink of sweat radiated of them like a vile aura.

"The captain has requested we escort you to our beautiful vessel. She be close by in the river. If you would please follow us. We'd hate for this to get... unpleasant." The others cackled with that last word. Each of them was a foot taller than Simone and twice as wide. They seemed almost disappointed when the woman simply nodded, grabbed her coat and closed the door behind herself.

"Okay then, gents, lead away." She said cheerily.

"Would the lady care to be carried?" The lead gnoll offered. With a cheeky grin Simone nodded and in a flash she was hoisted off her feet and thrown over the gnoll's shoulder. She gave a sigh, not sure why she expecting any different. Doubt set in as the sweaty smell was even worse up close. The other gnolls chuckled at eachother, some of them using the opportunity to try and sneak a look up her skirt. Thankfully the beast's broad shoulder was comfortable enough. She stayed calm as the pack made way for the river, making small talk with the gnolls.

"So how long have you guys known Seafang?"

"Arr, he found us all as pups, raised us like his sons. Instilled within us a love of the sea, raiding and plundering. He inspires us all and each of us would follow him into hell if he ordered it." The lead gnoll said, sounding surprisingly emotional through his snarling voice. The others all quietly nodded along. "This crew, she be one big happy family." The beast continued.

"Now we all drift across the endless waters, our home ever with us." Another crewmember added, earning his own round of agreement. Their chat didn't last much longer as they had arrived at their destination. Simone was set down as gently as the lead gnoll could muster and turned around.

"Avast, me datey!" A boisterous voice called out. His first line to her was a dad joke. Simone instantly knew the story of Seafang raising the other crew had to be true now. But as she saw him she was more than convinced a bad taste in humor wouldn't dampen this date one bit.

Seafang stood tall and proud, a toothy smile on his face and an outfit that had to be seen to be believed. A long, ornately detailed duster that looked straight out of a pirate novel. Gold trimmings, fine leatherworking and a scabbard to its side for a large broadsword, he had it all. His face looked as ruggedly handsome as ever. If there were any signs that he was older than the crew, his appearance didn't show them. He wore a stained white undershirt and his fingers were coated in large golden rings and jewels. His pants matched the duster coat and his large boots were shining as he struck a powerful pose. Simone was certainly impressed by the captain, but his ship was quite a sight too.
12131.title: Seafang, the gnoll pirate

choices: It's delicious
It tastes like gnoll sweat but Simone forces herself to eat it
It tastes like gnoll butt, Simone can't stomach another bite
121312.content:
The gnoll pirate ship looked awe-inspiring and terrifying in equal measure. A rusted hulk, patches of crudely fitted metal covering holes from bow to stern. It looked like an old navy warship. The cannons were still there, but they had been loaded with what could only be described as giant grappling hooks. Gnolls were going about their business everywhere, scurrying across the deck. Most of the ship's doors had been removed and the holes crudely cut bigger. These beasts looked like they would struggle inside a regular vessel. It made Simone all the more curious to see what they had done to the inner workings.

"All aboard! The sea, she be waiting." The captain announced grandly.

Simone followed the crewmen that carried her here up the gangplank and with a loud, rumbling blast of the horn they set off. Seafang came down to greet her more personally. To her surprise he didn't reek as badly as the others. There was still a very distinct smell of unwashed gnoll in the air, but she had worried that he had gotten his rank by being the smelliest gnoll of them all.

"Welcome aboard the Slavering Raider, miss Andrewson. I be Seafang, in case that wasn't clear yet. I look forward to this date. Be assured, the crew has been informed that you are not to be harmed or harassed in any way, lest they meet my wrath. Though if you warm up to these cute little puppies I am sure you'll find us all more than happy to share your love." He explained with a toothy smile. Simone breathed a sigh of relief, knowing how some of the crew were leering at her. But before she could get comfortable the captain leaned in, putting a hand on the wall behind her and breathing heavily in her face.

"But if you hurt any of my beloved family... There will be no safe haven in the world that can protect you." He growled threateningly before catching himself intimidating his date and stepping back. She gulped. But Simone didn't start texting this gnoll through Monstr because she was afraid. She steeled herself and turned her attention to the captain's first mate. He'd been standing idly, seemingly waiting for orders of some kind.

"Aw, I don't think I'd ever be able to hurt a big, strong beast like you." She said seductively, reaching up to scratch him behind the ear. The first mate's tongue lolled out the side of his maw as he panted happily.

"Mister Breach, do you not have a place to be? Go and make sure the crew are ready for our next adventure." Seafang commanded sternly. Simone just gave him a smile.

"You're not getting jealous already, are you? I just want to show you I appreciate your crew too." She said, her voice drenched in sugar. "But I'm not here because I appreciate them. I'm here because I want you." Simone put a finger on the gnoll's chest. His heart went aflutter as he felt his love for her be reinforced by her confidence.

"Then you shall see that Seafang leaves no-one wanting. Come, my treasure, the men have prepared a feast for us all." He extended an arm and she took it. Together they walked along the deck of his warship towards the bridge tower. She was curious to see where this would lead, but she hadn't expected to see anything like what the gnolls had done to the ship.

The inside of the steel hull had been almost completely gutted. Only a framework of thick, metal pillars was still left to keep the place from collapsing under its own weight. There looked to be just one lower deck left, a furred frenzy of crewmen moving around. At the front and the back of this cavernous metal hall were holes in the floor, gnolls jumping in an out. Probably the storage hold. Up above she could see the interior of the gutted comms tower, only a few crewmen staying on their posts to steer the ship and keep a weather eye out for opportunities. The back of the tower had still been left somewhat intact, forming the only real separate room within this large shell. It was even more remarkable because it had an actual door in it, not just a crudely torn hole. It was probably Seafang's personal quarters.

It was almost time for dinner and the crew had set up a long table in the middle of the room, covering it with stained tablecloths and preparing an elaborate meal. The food turned Simone's stomach a little as it was very clear gnolls didn't bother with such fineries as cooking their food. Chunks of raw, bloodied meat were stacked on dirty dishes. Seafang could see his date's discomfort and spoke calmly.

"Fret not, I had mister Breach prepare you something more to your tastes. You'll have to forgive his cooking skills, he tries his best." He surprised his date by hoisting her off her feet and hopping down, landing with a heavy thump and setting her down beside him again. "Sorry about that, the Slavering Raider isn't the most... human-friendly vessel in these seas." He mused, prompting a chorus of suppressed giggles from the crew. The first mate emerged again, pointing the captain and his date to their seats and serving them both a roasted meal. Simone was pleasantly surprised. It looked a bit crude, but edible. What surprised her more was the captain being served a similar dish.

"I will not be sitting here and letting you feel all awkward being the only one to eat cooked food. Anyone got a problem with that, my boot is more than ready to listen to their complaints." He said brashly, putting a smile on her face. Of course there were limits to what the gnolls would do to accommodate her and cutlery was probably a bit too much to ask around here. Striving to fit in with the beasts she picked up the roast and dug in.
121312.title: Meeting the ship and crew

choices: Ship ahoy! There's pirating to be done.
A small town is getting a visit from the Slavering Raider
Seafang takes Simone to his personal quarters
1213122.content:
At the first bite it was clear that for all the effort made to cook her something, these foul beasts had still given it their own personal flair. It tasted like it had been stewing in the first mate's armpit for an hour. It was nasty, but she knew there would likely be repercussions if she already started acting prissy around the gnolls. Seafang especially seemed to look intently at her, gauging her reaction. Was he trying to test her? After she ate a few more bites and put on her best fake smile he seemed satisfied. He opened his maw wide and tore through his dinner with great ferocity. She might've had a headstart, but he finished much faster than her. As she finally completed her meal she looked over to the captain. He gave her an almost silly grin and motioned for her to look behind her.

Simone turned around to see the first mate standing next to her, an expecting look in his face. He wanted to know how he did. Should she be honest to him as part of the test? Hurting his feelings might not be smart. Splatters of blood were still present on his jaws from his own dinner.

"You did well, mister Breach. Maybe next time we can cook together..." She said calmly, hearing a slightly perturbed huff behind her. "...if the good captain permits it, of course." Simone added, looking back to Seafang who'd calmed down and sat back.

"T... Thanks." He stammered, trying to stay calm in the eyes of the captain. "I... I didn't have any spices to I had to improvise."

"Aw, that's okay. Next time you raid a ship, I'll plunder the kitchen for spices."

"Hah, she's already gettin into the pirate life. I knew you were the right choice for ol' Seafang." The captain yelled boisterously. "Three cheers for miss Andrewson." He announced, the crew howling and yipping along. The cheers got even louder as he extended his hand and pulled her in the moment she grabbed it, planting a big, slobbery kiss on her cheek.

Simone blushed brightly, held in the gnoll's strong arms, spittle dripping down her cheek. She could only think of one way to make this moment even better. She reached up to Seafang, who was hyping up the crew., and guided his face down to meet hers. With pursed lips she pushed forwards, planting a big smooch right on his stocky muzzle. The captain didn't need to hesitate before accepting this invitation. If she wanted the full experience he would show her that gnolls were monsters in so many ways.

His thick tongue entered the scene and danced around in her mouth. Simone felt her legs turn to jelly as the powerful beast took charge, delivering a passionate kiss unlike anything she'd ever experienced. Though the taste was still nasty, she was alarmed by how little she seemed to care about it. All that mattered to her now was extending this kiss for as long as possible. The crew cheered even louder in the background, standing up to clap, dance and go wild. Finally it was brought to an end and the captain gave her a wide grin.

"Where have you been all my years?" He asks, his voice barely audible over the crew's noise.

"Waiting for a strong, powerful man to sweep me off my feet and take me on an adventure." She responds.

"And an adventure this shall be." The gnoll declares proudly. "Mister Breach, give the command to weigh anchor immediately! The call of the sea shall be answered!"

The first mate barely needed to say a word as the crew were all there to hear the captain's orders. A deep thrum boomed into life as the ship's engines fired up. Some stragglers stayed behind to stash the dinner plates whilst the captain gave his date an amorous look. "Ya best be getting comfortable with the Slavering Raider, miss Andrewson."

"Please, call me Simone." She replied quickly.

"Very well, miss Simone. Are ye ready for pirating, plunder and pleasure?"

"Yes, yes and yes." Simone gave that last yes a seductive tone, putting a hand on the gnoll's cheek."
1213122.title: Dinner with the captain

choices: He kills the human captain
He feasts on the human captain
He wants Simone to kill the human captain
12131221.content:
"Ship ahoy! We got one on radar!" One of the gnolls up in the comms tower called out.

"Full speed, let's reel 'em in!" The captain ordered. Gnolls scurried back and forth, some now brandishing crude tools. Simone was surprised not to see any of the beasts carrying weapons. Only the captain seemed to be equipped with a sword. Was it just for show? He reached out to her, offering to take her back up to the main deck. She gladly took his hand, letting him wrap her up in his muscular arms. With one mighty leap they were out of the hold and on the main deck. Here too there was a flurry of activity, the main guns creaking and turning. In the distance she could see their target, a cargo ship. It didn't look like much, but it was getting closer fast. The Slavering Raider had some serious engine power and relatively little weight, making it alarmingly fast for something this big.

"You be knowing the drill, men! No witnesses, no survivors!" The captain cried out to a chorus of yips, howls and cheers. Simone gulped a little. She'd expected the beasts to overpower the human crew and hold them hostage. But the captain's words, brutal as they were, held a measure of sense. She'd not heard of the gnoll pirates before and this was the only way to keep their secret.

With less than a kilometer between the ships the cannons let loose a thunderous volley. Anchors sailed through the air, carrying iron chains with them. They crashed into the cargo ship's hull and deck, lodging themselves in the shattered steel. Several small crews of gnolls began turning a large mechanical contraption to reel in the chains and pull them closer together. When the iron ribbons were pulled taut another order was given.

"Runners, introduce yourselves!" Seafang bellowed. Simone looked in awe as some of the gnolls got up on the chains and ran along them towards the cargo ship. Maybe their monstrous nature made it easier, but the woman's jaw nearly hit the floor at seeing this feat of agility. They were met with the crack of gunfire as the ship's desperate crew tried to fight off these inhuman invaders. But either they were terrible shots or the gnolls were bulletproof, because it didn't seem to faze them in the slightest. When a bullet whizzed close to her and the captain he quickly pushed her behind himself.

"What? Those beasts would dare shoot at you? If we weren't merciless sea dogs already I'd order the men to kill them all." He said, snarling a little at this affront.

Simone was quietly happy to hide behind the captain's broad figure. For one it would spare her the sight of what the gnolls were about to do to those men. The screams and roars on the other hand were still clear as day. All the while the Slavering Raider was still reeling in the other ship. This went on until they met with a loud, dull CLANG. The shock nearly sent Simone to the deck, but Seafang was quick to catch her. The remaining gnolls jumped across to assist in slaughtering what was left of the crew. But cargo ships aren't known for large crews and the runners had already dealt with most of them.

When the screams went silent Simone dared look from behind Seafang. It looked as harrowing as she thought, sprays of blood coating the cargo ship's deck. the men laid strewn about, most of them savagely mauled. Simone looked away, but the captain took hold of her and jumped across.

Simone paid as little attention to the carnage as she could, following the handsome gnoll up through the narrow corridors of the cargo ship. It put his broad physique to the test as he had to squeeze through doorways made for humans. Finally he entered the bridge. There was one man inside, sat kneeling between two gnolls. Each had a paw on the man's shoulder, holding him down and giving him a painful squeeze whenever he tried to resist. They'd kept him alive for Seafang, but what did the gnoll have planned for him?
12131221.title: Ship ahoy! There's pirating to be done.

"I saved him for you, my sweetest. I'm sure you would love to do the honors." The beastly man mused with a smooth voice. Simone froze up for a moment. Did he really expect her to commit murder on the first date? And what was he hoping she would do? Kill a man with her bare hands? This was starting to get a lot more intense than she could've imagined.

"Oh, I don't know. Can't the great Seafang find it in his heart to spare this poor man?" She cuddled up close to him, giving the gnoll puppy eyes and hoping he'd have a change of heart. It was a long shot, but it felt like her best way out of this situation. Mercifully the monster laughed.

"Haha, isn't she the most lovely treasure in the sea? Very well, we'll take our leave. This vermin is beneath us anyway" He spoke grandly, guiding Simone back to the Slavering Raider. But before he left the bridge he signaled to his men to ensure there would be no witnesses. They quietly choked the human captain whilst Simone made a quick stop in the ship's kitchen to take some spices along with her. Seafang gave her an amused nod as he watched the small woman pillage the kitchen like a seasoned pirate. He'd work on her bloodlust some other day, for now it would be regular lust that was on his mind.

Minutes later Simone and Seafang were back aboard his ship. She had handed the spices over to a crewman to bring to the kitchen and the remaining crew was busy tearing open cargo containers and hauling over anything of value. Fancy electronics, medical shipments, anything that looked like it could sell well according to the quartermaster. Simone caught little of this as the captain was more interested and showing her more features of his own ship. Frankly, she was getting a little bored by it all. As endearing as the proud father routine was, she wanted to get into the things they'd talked about over text before this date started. As he was about to gush over some part of his ship again she put a finger on his lips.

"I've got a better idea. How about we go to the captain's quarters and start exploring some of your features." The way she spoke, her sultry voice. The gnoll had to stop himself from tackling her to the ground and ravaging her there and now. With haste he lifted her off her feet and practically dashed across the deck, leaping up to his quarters and closing the ornate door behind him.

12131221311.content:
Seafang crawled on all fours towards his date. This was the moment they'd both been hoping for. Simone had been quite transparent in her texts about what she'd hoped to get from the date and the gnoll eagerly agreed, his love for this unusual woman only deepening. Her smooth body was laid out before him, unblemished and perfect. Her smile could melt steel as she checked out his body.

12233.content:
Here are a couple of other monsters to consider:

Wahasha -- Wahasha belongs to a species of large, hairy, semi-canine humanoids. Possibly the best example of how one of Wahasha's people look is the Beast from the Beauty and the Beast. Ironically, the transformed Prince Adam behaved nothing like one of Wahasha's people would act. They are a tribal people, fiercely loyal to family, friends and clan, and taught from an early age to behave in very polite ways at all times. It would not do, however, to mistake Wahasha's kindness for weakness. Wahasha's people are know for their ferocity in battle.

Wahasha stands more than two meters tall and is solidly built. His fur is always washed and brushed, and he typically wears well kept and well fitting clothing one might expect an eighteenth century well to do Englishman to wear.

James -- James is a ghost. Maybe. He can communicate, sort of, with half whispered words and projected emotions. He can sometimes touch so that if feels like a human being, and sometimes just like the hint of a soft breeze. How he got on the Monstr App, no one is really sure. Maybe it summoned him from beyond the grave, or from the Spirit Dimension. Maybe he wants to move on, or maybe he just wants to get laid. No one is sure. But whatever his motives, he's sure to make an interesting and memorable date!

Teritus "Dawg" Milicai -- Teritus is a six foot six, leanly muscled anthrowolf/snowboard hound. Something of a loaner, he continually migrates to stay in wintry conditions where he can pursue his main passion, snowboarding.Teritus is an easygoing sort who never pushes himself on anyone. If you like him, he's happy. If not, your loss, and he's moving on to the next snowboarding tournament.

Quartus Milicai Teritus' older brother, he is the more serious, responsible brother. Where Teritus is happy to hook up, Quartus wants a longer lasting romantic relationship. Of the two, Quartus is actually the more athletic, but pursues more martial oriented sports. Quartus tends to be more serious than his brother, is taller, and has more scars.

1253121.content:
"Just be cool, Hugo, just be cool," the giant said to himself as he stepped out of the rift the MONSTR app created for the Monsters dating humans, and onto the front lawn of his potential date.

Like all the giants of his particular race, Hugo was fair skinned and blonde, and rather handsome. He was about a foot taller than average, and though he wasn't dumb, he was a bit sow compared to other giants. So when the time came, he was one of the few of his friends who didn't go to university.

But Hugo's secret shame was that he was a pervert. At least by Giant Standards.

For one thing, although most Giants "liked it rough," Hugo was the gentle sort. Maybe this was a reaction to the fact he was was always bigger than the other giants, even when he was growing up. Most giants would naturally give in to their bullying instincts. But for some reason, Hugo's reaction was to go the other way.

Hugo didn't have much luck with giant women either. He had the looks and the equipment that attracted giant women, but Hugo much preferred "rubbing" rather than "penetrating." And Hugo's inherent gentleness was a complete turnoff to potential giantess lovers.

And Hugo was secretly sexually attracted to human women.

Most giants detest humans, least of all because of their long history of being on the losing side of any and all conflicts with humanity. If a human was found in the land of the giants, the human was firmly escorted out of giant land. No harm was ever done to the intruding human, for fear of a human retaliation. But most giants liked to pretend humans didn't exist, unless forcibly confronted with their reality.

But not Hugo. Hugo had been fascinated by humans ever since learning about them in elementary school. And when Hugo started going through puberty, his fascination became sexual fantasies about human women.

Hugo had the good sense not to share his fantasies with any other giants.

When the MONSTR app came along, Hugo wanted instantly to download it. Unfortunately for him, the app was almost immediately illegal in giant land. It took him forever to get a pirated copy of the app,

When he did, Hugo put in for a two week vacation at work, explaining he would be going on a backpacking trip to a remote region of Giant Land.

Truthfully, most of his co-workers could care where he went, and probably wouldn't notice if he never returned.

Hugo eagerly started going through the app, and when he came across a dark beauty named Donna, he immediately swiped right, And to his surprise and delight, Donna indicated she wanted a date with him!

So here he was, on her front lawn. To a curious onlooker, no one would see anything but an empty lawn. The app projected that illusion.

Hugo knelt down in front of the door and gently tapped on it. Moments later, Donna stepped out of the door, looking even more beautiful than even her picture. He admired how her dark, straight hair hung past her shoulders, how her brown eyes radiated warmth, how the loose T-shirt didn't conceal her prominent breasts, or how the jeans revealed a firm butt and slightly narrow but still womanly hips.

Hugo was so enraptured by Donna's appearance that she had to repeat herself twice.

"I'm sorry, what did you say?" Hugo asked, embarrassed.

"I said it was very nice to meet you, and I would invited you in, but..." Donna gestured at her parent's living room and then at Hugo's height. Hugo laughed, suddenly feeling more relaxed.

"That's okay. We can just start on our date," Hugo answered. "So where did you want to go?"

Donna answered, "I was thinking we could go to

Marline "Marv" Dawson - 27. Owner of Dawson Garage. If it has a motor, she knows how to fix it, growing up in the place, which has been in her family for three generations. Then the economy in her area dried up, and as a result, she's had fewer customers as a result. In fact, things have gotten bad enough that she practically lives in the office space above the garage, as she was forced to sell her home just to keep it. Worse than that, there's a rather aggressive debt collection agency that's trying to collect the deed to the garage - why? She doesn't fully understand, as she knows that she can't pay off her debt if they take the garage. Between various debts and interest, she somehow owes over a million dollars. Then there's the Real Estate agency that, again, is trying to buy the place for far too low an offer. In need of a distraction, she's turned to the app in order to find some sort of entertaining diversion..

Sally Jones - 31. Works for the CIA as a Field Agent. She and a number of other agents were tasked to set up accounts in order to investigate the supposed Monster World. She wasn't expecting what she got.

Julia Roberts - 21. More of a Collage Exchange student in the Monster World. While she's been learning a lot, one does get bored.

125331.content:
Marline, or Marv as she was better known around the shop, had finished fixing her short-cut hair, looked about as ready as she was able to get for her date.

"What do you think, Hank?" she asked, looking at the feet of the one mechanic still working for her, who was under a truck.

Hank rolled himself out from under the vehicle. "If I didn't prefer men, I might think of asking you to some diner for dinner."

Marv chuckled. "Thanks."

Hank rolled himself back under. "Just need to tighten one more bolt, and Mr. Person's truck will be good for him to pick up up tomorrow."

"I'm sure he'll be glad to hear that," said Marv. "Those Scapali guys charge too much to be a fair rate."

"They have money though," said Hank. "They keep asking."

"And I still say 'No' to their offer," said Marv. "Their price is insulting."

"Then there's those Jameson guys, still trying to collect the money you owe," said Hank.

"I still say that someone used my business to commit some kind of fraud," said Marv. "They aren't getting the deed to the place."

"Dumb question, but where would the deed be?" Hank asked, as he came back out.

Marv chuckled. "That's one secret I'm keeping," she said. "If you don't know, you can't accidently tell anyone."

"Close to your heart, right?" Hank asked, putting a somewhat grease-stained hand over his left breast.

Marv chuckled. "A little further away." Her phone buzzed, just as the door knocked.

"I'm here," the phone said.

"Date's here?" Hank asked.

"I think so," said Marv.

"Kind of funny for him to knock on the door and text you at the same time though," said Hank. "Mind if I take a look?"

"Like a big brother, right?" Marv asked, with a chuckle.

"I do owe you," said Hank. "You let me work for you, criminal record and all."

"Sometimes one needs a second chance," said Marv, as she double checked the mirror, one last time.

She then heard the door open, and Hank call out, "You Two! What are you doing here?"

Marv looked, and saw both Steve Scapali and John Jameson enter the place.

"Let's talk business," said Steve. "Seems you owe quite a bit of money on this shop, Marline. I'm willing to take this debt off of your hands, in exchange for the shop."

"Only my mother and teachers were allowed to call me Marline," said Marv. "You're not."

"My agency will collect one day, or another," said John. "After that, the shop will be sold. This might be your last chance for a peaceful solution."

"If that's a threat, I can report you to the Better Business Bureau," said Marv. "In fact, if you're working together on this, I can report you both for Conflict of Interest."

Steve chuckled. "Try it. I have lawyers."

"As do I," said John.

"And we have them too," said another voice.

Marv looked, and saw, wearing suits, and giving off the vibe that screamed "Bodyguard" a lion-like man, as well as one that looked like a cheetah.

"Um, is one of you Palor?" she asked.

"He's in the vehicle," the lion-man said. "He sent us in to make sure that there wasn't trouble."

"Not at the moment," said Marv. "Mr. Scapali and Mr. Jameson were both leaving." She looked at them. "Right?"

"Some other time," said Steve.

"Remember what we said," said John.

The two left, walking around the bodyguards, who watched them leave.

Marv sighed. She looked at the two feline-like beings. "Um, thanks."

The cheetah smiled. "Not a problem, miss."

Marv then saw Hank peek his head into the doorway. "You alright?"

"Sorry I couldn't help, Marv," Hank said, looking embarrassed. "They just pushed past me."

"Well, I hired you to fix cars, not play security," said Marv.

"Whomever your date is, they've got serious money," said Hank, as he came in, stepping around the bodyguards, carefully. "They showed up in a stretch limousine, the kind that allows for twenty people in the back."

"Pelor, and his family are, indeed, wealthy," said the lion-man.

"Maybe he can help out," Hank said, quietly.

"Only if he sends those who need their cars looked after," said Marv. She looked at the bodyguards. "Um, how many are with us?"

"Us, another bodyguard, and the driver, who does a good job in a pinch, and yourself and Pelor," said the cheetah-man.

"Alright," Marv said, as she walked to the door. "Hank, clean and close up shop for the night. See you tomorrow."

"Call me if you need a ride," said Hank.

Marv looked at him, and chuckled. "I'll keep that in mind."

As Marv stepped outside, she was surprised to see the stretch limousine. The price on it was certainly easily a hundred thousand dollars. She had to admit, the grease monkey in her wanted to pop the hood and check the engine out. "If he ever needs a mechanic, I hope he has me in mind."

The two bodyguards chuckled, before escorting her to the limousine. They opened the back door, and allowed her in.

That was when Marv saw that Pelar was
125331.title: Marline "Marv" Dawson - Mechanic

choices: High End American-Style Restaurant

Dinner at His Place.
1253315.content:
Marv had to blink for a moment. What she was looking at looked very human, save for the ears, and perhaps the eyes. It reminded her of something from Tolkien's works, or those of Gygax.

"You're an elf?" she said.

"Expecting something scarier, and not human-like?" Pelor asked.

Marv nodded.

Pelor chuckled. "You'd be surprised at the horrors an elf, such as myself, could do. To be honest though, I'm surprised at the horrors humans can do. Demons have nothing on you."

Marv thought about the things that had been invented during wars that did a lot of damage, death, and destruction. "I hope you're not going to say that elves are superior."

Pelor scoffed. "Hardly. We can be just as much of an asshole as a human can be. Same with any other monster race. Of course, most try to be decent, as it's much easier to get what one wants when they don't act like a douchebag over it."

Marv had to blink. "You're certainly not talking like I'd thought than an elf would talk. Then there's your choice of vehicle - this thing probably takes a lot of gasoline to keep running. Not exactly environmentally friendly."

"Language is quite infectious, and English seems to be the most commonly used language, along with this one Chinese dialect called Mandarin," said Pelor. "That being said, we're still working on how to improve this thing, so that it can use something that's easy to produce."

"Alright," said Marv. She looked, and saw, sitting about five feet from her, the lion-man and the cheetah-man. Then, there was the partition, and she saw sitting in the driver seat, something that looked like a human-sized bird, with a human-sized lizard sitting next to them. "If you forgive me, but this reminds me of something out of those Lord of the Rings movies. That or Dungeons and Dragons."

Pelor laughed at this. "Good movies, and that game is fun. D&D5e has a lot of options. Can't wait to see how they handle different elf-mixes."

"What do you mean?" Marv asked.

"Let's just say that there's some truth to the various subraces those games like to do," said Palor. "My own father could have been the inspiration behind the Drow known as Drizzt Do'Urden. As for my mother, Arwen from the Lord of the Rings books could have been based off of her."

"Wait, Lord of the Rings was written during the 1950's," said Marv. "Are you saying that your mother is over eighty years old?"

Palor chuckled. "Try three hundred, and you're getting closer."

"Please tell me that you're less than fifty," said Marv.

"Thirty-seven years," said Pelor. "We live for a long time."

"I hope that you're of Legal Age then," said Marv.

Pelor chuckled. "Everything's good."

"Alright," said Marv. "So, where are we going?"

Pelor grinned. "I think you might like it."

13.content:
Timothy the minotaur. The last few millennia were spent in his labyrinth alongside the massive collection of books given to him over time. But as his home faded into myth and legend the amount of human visitors slowly decreased to nothing. Not that it made all that much difference. The only humans he ever came across ran away screaming. After all this time though, there was finally hope. An app that could get him in touch with someone who wouldn't run at the sight of his 12 foot tall half-man half-bull figure. Tim was a little hesitant at first, but to his surprise it didn't take long to find a match. Nervous as all hell, he waits at the entrance of his labyrinth to receive his first visitor in centuries.

Gnaw the gnoll wrestler. Infamous in the village for his skills in the ring and his knack for using his unwashed body to dominate opponents, he's had a wide choice of gnoll ladies fawning over him. But secretly he was looking for something a bit harder to get. Being a 7 foot beast with a big paunch and muscles for days was standard for all gnolls, but he felt himself drawn to something wildly different. Something soft and tender. A waifish little human girl for the gnoll to cuddle and spoil all day long. What few humans were around didn't have a lot of status in his village. They were mostly servants and treated like dirt. But that wouldn't be the fate of the girl he met through Monstr. Gnaw would treat his new girlfriend like a princess, and woe betide anyone who would dare hurt her. Hopefully she wouldn't mind the smell.

13111123312.content:
"You are no longer bound to this place."

"Excuse me?" Tim said, not able to follow along with Alice's words. Did she really say what he thought she was saying?

"You weren't able to leave before, I've lifted that curse. You're finally free to explore the world."

"I... I don't know what to say... Thank you. Thank you so much. You have no idea how much this means to me. How were you even able to do this?"

"A few thousand years has corroded the magics holding you here down to something I was able to break. The strangest catch was that the ritual called for something very... intimate. It required us to have sex."

"Wait, so you only laid with me because you wanted to complete your ritual and unleash me on the world?" Tim said, his tone turning sad.

"Absolutely not!" Alice huffed. "I did this because I love you. And I want to invite you to come live with me. I've got a large farm where nobody will bother us and we can have all the fun we want together. Also, I'd heard that you would be amazing to make love to and those legends have greatly undersold the truth. Last night was the best night of my life."

Tim turned beet red hearing this woman gush about him and his sexual prowess. He didn't have much of a frame of reference, but he could honestly admit that living with her might not be the worst thing to happen to him. It seemed like the least he could do to reward her for ending his imprisonment. Not to mention that last night was pretty damn epic for him as well.

"So, what do you say? Are you ready to leave this maze behind and come with me?"

The minotaur struggled to keep it together. Part of him wanted to hug her so much she'd snap in half, but for now he contained his gratitude and nodded. He swept her off her feet and cradled her in his powerful arms. Alice giggled as he walked briskly down the corridors towards the entrance. The steadily hastening rhythm of his footsteps belied his excitement, putting an even wider smile on her face. The bull man stopped near the front door, setting his date down. She walked outside and beckoned him over. Cautiously he took a step out of the front door. The oppressive force coercing him back was there, but something felt different. He pushed on and to his amazement he could feel the resistance peter out. What few last vestiges were left soon faded away. She had done it. The first human to meet him in millenia and she had freed him from the labyrinth. Tim felt like the luckiest minotaur in the world.

Alice watched him take his first cautious steps before seeing her date practically glow with joy. It made her next question an easy one to ask.

"Congratulations, you're free. But now that you are, have you considered my offer? You and I would live together long and happily on my farm. I'll introduce you to all my friends. But I understand if you want to go out and see more of the world than just my little home. I can't expect you to trade sitting in one place all the time for sitting in another."

Before she could make more excuses Tim reached down and put a finger on her lips.

"I've spent thousands of years cooped up in here, I can handle a few decades with you." He said calmly. The sad truth was that in his millenia-long lifespan, the time he'd spend with her would be brief. But if last night was any indication, it would certainly be memorable.

Alice squealed with glee, hopping around and reaching up to request a hug from her date. Tim leaned down further and pulled her into a big, loving kiss. His bovine charm turned her legs to jelly as he passionately made out with her. She guides him to a parked van, apologizing for having put him in the back. He awkwardly nods, folding himself into the relatively small vehicle. By some miracle the suspension didn't buckle under his weight and soon the two were off. Alice's farm was several hours away, which they spent chatting about the world. Tim was eager to see more of it, but above everything else he was eager to show his gratitude to Alice. They occasionally exchanged a lengthy kiss, Alice having to park first since the experience made it impossible to pay attention to anything other than Tim. That thick, bovine tongue dancing around in her mouth was her own personal slice of heaven.

Finally they arrived at the farm. It was large and remote, the farmhouse looking a bit disheveled. She guided him to the barn, which had been mostly stripped out. She hadn't gone and furnished the place much, not wanting to feel so presumptuous as to expect him to automatically say yes to her invitation. Tim gave a calm laugh. He'd make this place a home quick enough.

"Hey sweetie, can you help me with this?" Her voice rang out near the door. He pushed it open to see Alice standing alongside a strange machine. Tim was a little confused what she was planning, but she quickly filled him in. "This is a milking machine I've had built for you."

The large cow-man blushed. "Uhm... Alice... I'm not a cow. I don't have udders."

And my books tell me that your cum has all kinds of interesting properties. I mean, a divinely spawned bull for a father tends to mess with one's genetics." It was a large stack of straw bales in a sturdy wooden frame covered in thick cloth. Tim sat down and she slid up beside him. 1311112331223.content:
Alice enters Tim's home to see him packing a few items together into an improvised bag. Her expression becomes a little upset and she steps up to the large bull-man.

"What are you doing?"

Tim wasn't shocked in the slightest by her appearance. By now she'd practically made it a routine to use her machine once in the morning and once in the evening. He began to feel like a regular cow instead of a person and her increasingly cold indifference towards his desires didn't help.

"Good morning Alice. I've thought about this for a while. I'm ready to go out there and discover more of the world. It's been fun here for the last few months, but I don't want to coop myself up here when there's so much more to see out there." He said cheerfully, trying not to be confrontational about what he really felt.

She tried to hide her sneer, but she could tell Tim was going to be uncooperative. "Is that the thanks I get for freeing you from that labyrinth?"

Tim rolled his eyes. "I think the swimming pool's worth of cum you've been milking from me is more than enough gratitude."

Alice huffed indignantly. Her near literal cash cow was about to walk out the door. "You can't leave. How do you think the rest of the world is gonna react to you? They'll hunt you down."

"The fact an app like Monstr even exists tells me that it's not gonna be so bad."

Finally she lost her temper. "I won't let you leave! The wards I've put up to protect you will keep you in here until you learn some respect."

Tim shot back a fierce glare. "Respect?! Like meeting a guy and helping him just so you can imprison him yourself and use him like your fucking cattle?! Maybe you're right, maybe humanity isn't as great as I thought, but it shouldn't be hard to find someone better with how low you've dropped the bar just now. So let's get one thing straight here..." He stomped over to the milking machine and picked it up.

"This shit. Ends. Now!" He snarled, throwing the machine on the floor, shattering the glass container on the side and reducing it to a sad, warped hunk of scrap. "Now release me!" He bristled.

Alice just laughed at the brutish display. "Or what? You'll do the same to me? Thanks to the potions I made with your cum I'm practically immortal. And you can't escape the wards around this barn without my help. You're mine, and I will make sure you remember your place."

Tim's rage dissipated, making way for calculated anger. He was still livid, but she was probably right. Killing her would be difficult. But perhaps there were other ways of punishing her. He looked around and saw the instruments of his vengeance in the remnants of her infernal machine. He shook the ground with each heavy stomp as he thundered towards Alice. The first step was making sure she'd not get out of his reach. The woman seemed confident in her ability to withstand his punishment. She didn't expect him to give her a taste of her own medicine.

The minotaur pulled some loose pieces of metal from the scrap, He held her in one hand whilst laying it on the ground, putting her down on top of it. His strength easily bent the metal, wrapping it around her midsection. By her own admission he didn't need to be gentle or careful at all, making sure her hands were tightly trapped to her sides.

"What are you doing, you stupid beast?!" She hissed before her face turned pale. Tim reached up and grabbed a length of rusty chain hanging from one of the beams in the barn. He fastened it to the metal band around Alice and tightened the other end to the wooden beam.

"There, now we're both prisoners here. I can't force you to break your spells, but I'm sure I can wait them out. Those wards you've built probably need maintaining. I wonder how many weeks it'll take for them to fade. And I hope your potions stop you from getting hungry too, all I've got for you is hay. Oh, and just to be sure..." He reached in and put his large hands around Alice's waist, feeling all around the metal band before exploring the rest of her body.

"What are you doing to me?" She cried out.

"Just gotta make sure you don't have some potion stashed away that'll let you escape. Be happy I don't just rip those clothes off." He huffed back. When he was done he walked over to the couch and took a seat, throwing a wicked smile over to his prisoner.

"And now we'll see who breaks first."
1311112331223.title: Tim wants to leave, Alice won't let him

13111123312233.content:
Tim's daily routine took an unusual turn. Every morning he'd walk up to the front door and check if he could push through the wards yet. He could tell they were weakening without Alice being able to use her vile alchemy. Perhaps another couple of days and his strength would be able to overwhelm them. As for that witch herself, he stopped paying attention to her almost completely. He did give her a crude cloth gag to stop her from screaming at all hours of the day. Whatever sorcery she used canceled her need for sleep, something she demonstrated by robbing him of his.

This morning things felt different though. When he came to inspect her, more out of boredom than necessity, he saw something odd. Alice's wrists were bleeding a little where the metal band had been folded around them. He leaned in and pinched her leg. She yelped into the gag.

"Well well, looks like someone's protective potions have left their system. That means only a few more short days until dehydration kicks in. I really wish I could pity you, but after the way you treated me I'm fresh out of mercy." He taunted, pulling the cloth from her mouth.

"P... Please... I promise I'll let you go. I won't pursue you." She stammered. Tim just patted her condescendingly on the head.

"Alice, I wasn't born yesterday. That obsession in your eyes, your inability to stop staring at my junk, even now. Part of me really wants to give it to you, just once without your protections. I bet you wouldn't even be able to help yourself and beg for more, no matter how much it'd hurt. But I'm no monster like you. So I'll make this quick."

Tim reached in and wrapped his hand around her neck. It suddenly felt so fragile and weak. He squeezed it and felt the weakened muscle put up a token resistance before it bent under his will. A small pop was all he heard as he broke her neck. He fought off the urge to do more damage and ensure she was gone. To rip and tear and let all the frustration and anger from the past weeks and months out. He discarded the body alongside those thoughts and took a curious walk towards the door. How much of those wards' strength relied on her being alive?

He pushed again, surprised to find his hand barely inhibited anymore. As he took a first, cautious step outside it felt much like the last remnants of containing force from his labyrinth finally fading away. That's two prisons escaped in less than a year. Hopefully the next woman he meets will want him for romance instead of using him like cattle. He went back and grabbed the pack of things he'd prepared, including a phone. Carefully his large, stubby digits fidgeted through the options until he'd opened up Monstr.

1341.content:
Slim was hiking down the narrow trail, eager to meet up again with his date. She'd been sending him all kinds of teasing messages, looking forward to their date. He wasn't wholly sure what she had in mind, but he was happy to just meet someone like her. The parking lot was relatively close by, though he didn't plan to go all the way there. They agreed to meet up a little bit off the trail so any other hikers that might be there wouldn't cause a scene.

A few minutes later he heard someone up ahead on the trail. Slim quickly hid behind a few trees, his pudgy frame making it difficult to be fully concealed. Carefully he peeked to see if this was just some random hiker or his date. He'd never felt this nervous around humans before. Normally he'd just barge down the path and they could get out of the way or else. Why was he suddenly acting like this? He couldn't ponder on his little anxieties any longer when he heard a distinct voice call out.

"Slim? You out there?"

It felt like a boulder just slipped off the frog-man's shoulders. He emerged from behind the tree, waving his arm and greeting her. "Hey there. Good to see you again." Jessica didn't even seem remotely shocked to see him skulking through the woods like that. He quickly closed the distance and extended a large hand. She felt a touch intimidated as the pudgy monster stood a solid three feet taller than her, but she wouldn't show it. His skin was a little damp and remarkably smooth, surprising giving his rough outdoorsy lifestyle in his swamp. She giggled as she could tell he really held back on his handshake, not wanting to hurt her. Slim cleared his throat and finally found the words he wanted to say.

"So Jessica, shall we go to my place? I mean, we can go somewhere else too if you've got plans, but I reckon most human places might give me some weird looks." He got increasingly flustered by the word, seemingly forgetting he was by now holding on to her hand for an awkwardly long amount of time.

Jessica calmly put her other hand on his and in her most soothing voice responded. "That would be lovely."

"Do... do you want me to... carry you?" Slim asked nervously, finally letting go of her hand. Jessica blushed, thinking about the sensation of those big, strong arms lifting her off her feet. "Only if I'm not too heavy for you. I don't want to be a burden."

The frog-man smiles and leans down, one arm behind her back and another behind her thighs. In one seamless sweep he picks her up, cradling her like a child. He blushes brightly, giving her a reassuring look. "You're even lighter than I imagined." He flexes his muscles a little, rocking his date back and forth to get her as comfortable as possible. Jessica was feeling more than a little flustered. Firstly by him picking her up with such ease and secondly by him seeming having no problems carrying her. She thought he'd give it a gallant try and set her back down after a few steps, but he really didn't mind carrying her in his arms for miles. It felt strangely romantic, the two exchanging many amorous looks on the way to Slim's home.

The landscape quickly turned from the small woods near the parking space to the familiar swampland that housed the frog-man. His humble abode wasn't too much further. It was a ramshackle construction, but Slim had spent the last week repairing many of the holes in the roof and tidying up the worst of the trash. He hasn't had to give a damn about the state of the place for years, since nobody ever visited him. But now he wanted to really try and impress the woman in his arms. By his estimate he was doing a good job so far, given all the loving looks she gave him.

Along the way they talked about many things. Their shared love for nature, how cute dogs were and how aggravating most other hikers were. Though their methods for dealing with the worst of them did differ a little. Jessica proudly explained how she told off a few hikers that were littering. Slim responded by talking about how he followed a few litterbugs and ate them whole. His big belly grumbled a little at the memory, making his date feel nervous. He quickly reassured her though that he would never dare to eat someone as pretty as her. They arrived at his home shortly thereafter and the frog-man carefully carried his date inside, finally setting her down on his couch. Her perched his heavy rear down beside her, unsure of what to do next.

The stoner smiled from ear to ear, happier than ever before. With this most satisfying conclusion to their little orgy, the demons all take a minute to recover. Unsurprisingly Lola was ready for another round, but the elephant woman could tell that her date was a little too worn out to handle her right now.

As things calmed down he was permitted a look on the clock. It was getting late already. Having intimate fun with these demons really screwed with his sense of time. "Whoah. Hey Rheina, I think it's finally become time for me to head home. I gotta work tomorrow and I should sleep early to recover from my date." She blushed a little. The others all chuckled along too.

"Oh, it's a pity it has to end, but I guess it was inevitable. Just plan a long weekend for our next date, okay sweetie? I've got so much more I want to show you." She pushed her breasts together a little to smother him in their embrace. He returned a smile at the overwhelming affectionate gesture.

"You bet, babe. I gotta say, I thought going to hell would be bad, but if other demons are as nice as you, how bad can it be?"

"Heh, ask all the damned souls that aren't on our good side." Volka smirked maliciously. This little guy best not get the impression that their day job was anything other than relentlessly tormenting people. She then pulled out a small scrap of paper. "Look, I'm not supposed to bestow favors on mortals, but dammit you're too adorable. Keep this close to yourself. If you ever have someone in need or a little misery in their life, write their address on it. I'll pay that house a visit once a week and leave behind some farts that'll make anyone reconsider living there."

Francis gave an awkward smile. He didn't expect there to be gifts, let alone such... unique gifts. Anna piped up with something more conventional thankfully. "Here, take this. This isn't a favor, there's no strings attached, it's a gift." She held out a small purse, jingling with coins. He was a bit too stuck between his girlfriend's tits to accept it, so the little goblin put it on the table next to Volka's gift. Lola wasn't one to be outdone though. She produced a scrap of cloth with a fiery red rune on it. It was intricately detailed, a stark contrast to what looked like a well-used oil rag.

"Take this. If your blood touches that symbol it'll summon me to your side for a few minutes. If you're ever in danger and need a violent solution, rest assured I'll make sure there's nothing left of your enemies for any law enforcement to investigate." She proudly cracks her knuckles, looking ready to fight right now. Francis shuddered at the thought of her living up to those promises. Hopefully that's one sight he'll never need to see. With the other demons all bestowing gifts Rheina began to blush.

"Hmm, I've not really thought of something for you." She said sheepishly.

"Let's settle for a kiss then." The stoner replied with a cheesy smirk. She didn't need to be told twice and that big maneating maw pursed up for a sloppy smooch. Francis would love to lean into it, but he's currently wedged between two hefty breasts. The elephant woman's kiss is every bit as overwhelming as he expected, pulling his head into her maw and suckling on it like a lollipop. Finally he was permitted to leave the soft embrace of her chest and collect his gifts. He said his goodbyes to the other demons as they all poofed away in a flash of fire and smoke. Now it was just him and Rheina.

"Well, I guess I should take you back home." She said, sighing wistfully.

"I promise we'll be doing this again soon." Francis replied cheerfully. For all the weird, overwhelming craziness that he'd experienced over the last two days, he couldn't help but feel elated at the thought of taking another ride on this rollercoaster. It lifted the demon's spirits too, returning that kind smile to her face. "I could carry you back, but maybe we can have a little fun with it."

"Oh, I already think I know where this is going." Francis teased, holding up his hands and letting the elephant woman grab him. He would be making this journey inside of her, but where to put him. Rheina pondered her options.

1411232311221113223322312222.content:
Francis watched Rheina's face approach, both of them smiling from ear to ear. She pursed her lips and smothered his face with a soggy kiss. But as he could've predicted, there was no wet smack as their faces parted. Instead those thick lips slowly opened to accept his head into her maw. Her tongue awoke like an ancient beast from its slumber. The intruder in the cavernous maw was quickly assailed with big licks, the elephant woman moaning softly at his taste.

"Mmmm, you'we the mohst schrumpcious date I'vwe eveh hawd." She muttered with her mouth full. Francis wiggled, happy to be of service. Her gullet was eagerly awaiting his presence and with a noisy slurp she dragged most of his torso inside. Once his outstretched arms reached the back of her throat things sped up. The powerful muscles clamped down around his hands and Francis was only permitted a surprised 'whoah' before both arms had been sucked inside, his face mashed against the undulating folds. The next gulp sent half his body down, his feet just passing Rheina's lips. One last heavy gulp sent him travelling into the expansive network that was her body.

The slimy waterslide lasted longer than he thought it would, finally depositing him in her stomach. He landed with a wet splat in a large chamber. The walls were soft and calm, steadily rocking back and forth as she walked back to their meeting spot. To his surprise the stay in her stomach was a brief one. It began to cramp up and constrict, forcing him down into her bowels. She was up to something, but he couldn't quite grasp what it is. Nor could he really fight back against it. Her body was in complete control, gently pushing and squeezing him through her guts. The tiny nubs lining her intestines tickled his sides, his giggles proving infectious as the elephant woman snorts, failing to hold back a laugh herself.

Finally the narrow tube expanded into a large intestine. The walls were all immaculately clean save for a thin film of lubricating slime. It helped propel him to his final destination. Already he could see a few thin rays of light shine in as the puckered hole came closer. Rheina's instructions for this part were short and simple. "Feet first." He heard echoing through her innards. The man obliged and stuck his feet into the tight passage. Almost on command the hole undulated and though it was still a bit of a squeeze, he slid out, landing on a blue tarp.

In spite of the long journey through his girlfriend, Francis was not too disoriented. It was hard to tell how much time had passed, but he knew exactly where he was. He stood up on his trailer, looking around the empty parking lot where this wonderful adventure had started. The stoner thought back to that moment. When he laid eyes on her, he was almost convinced he would end up eaten and digested. What compelled him to go through with this idea still eluded him. He looked up to see Rheina squatting over the trailer, letting out a small fart before realizing her date had already left the building. She turned around and cooed gently at him.

"Awww, you look adorable." She patted the slime-soaked man gently, Giving him the space to hop off his trailer. He blushed and looked up to the elephant woman.

"Thanks. I hope we'll see eachother again soon." He blushed.

"You better believe it. I can't wait to taste you again." She smiled down at that tasty little man.

"You spent two days tasting me with every orifice on your body." The stoner gave her a confused look.

Rheina leaned in, lowering her voice to a seductive whisper. "I could taste you for a thousand years and not tire of the flavor." She licked her lips, looking ready to prove her point.

"Haha, alright, I'll bring some barbecue sauce to slather myself in next time." Francis joked, but the elephant woman gave a high-pitched squeak of joy at the suggestion. "You know just how to spoil me, little snack." She was salivating onto his trailer, already imagining the taste.

"Well, it's been a real trip. See you soon." He mumbled, stretching his arms wide. Rheina gladly obliged, picking him up and wrapping him into an overwhelming hug. Her soft tits were delightful as ever, cushioning him against the pressure those hefty arms produced. She concluded the embrace with a kiss, setting him down and waving goodbye as he drove off.

1452.content:
The large, carnivorous Ao Ao was quite the intimidating lady. Of South American descent, she stands at an imposing nine feet in height with a hefty body and chubby belly to match. Essentially being an anthropomorphic carnivorous boar-lady, Patricia has packed on quite the pounds over the years from all of the delicious humans that have traveled down her gullet. What can a girl say, they’re quite tasty. She’s also a big party animal, both figuratively and literally, but she also has a very short temper. However, she has had some interest in dating, and that Monstr app does give her an impressive list of options. And what’s the worst that could happen? If she doesn’t like her date she could just eat them. So, who does Patricia want to go out with?

Ted - A nervous college student a few years younger than her. He isn’t expecting Patricia to actually be a monster, believing Monstr to be a roleplaying app for people interested in supernatural creatures and Dungeons & Dragons. Ted is going to school for computer science and is very intelligent, if a bit quiet. Perhaps Patricia could liven him up a bit.

Larry - A 20-something survivalist who loves the outdoors and feels in-tune with nature. Very hearty and approachable, Larry is always the life of the party and usually has a pep in his step. He seems like a pretty good match for the boisterous boar-woman.

Derek - A stereotypical frat guy who loves to party until the sun comes up. Despite his ability to woe ladies of all sorts and show them a good time, most of those ladies are of the same species as him, plus, although he is a born-partier, Derek can come off a bit one-dimensional in conversation. He may sweep Patricia off of her hooves on the dance floor but beyond that he may run into some trouble.

14532.content:
Stephanie thumbed through all the men available in her phone again. There were so many choices. Did none of these poor saps understand what they signed up for? When she posted about wanting a man to toy with for a one night stand she didn't expect this level of response. She double-checked to make sure it was clear she was a giantess. Being a little over 120 feet tall tended to put one hell of a scare on anyone stumbling close to her lair. Her demand for chocolate was an optimistic one, but she figured it'd be fun to see what they'll come up with.

With the outpouring of potential dates she took one last look through the list before selecting someone. She had the liberty to be picky, rejecting a handful of men that seemed too pushy and rude right off the bat. She could have a new toy every night still for at least a month to come, and who knows how many more if she left her post on Monstr up longer. But it was time to make a choice. Who does she pick as her date?
14532.title: Stephanie Tsunade the giantess

choices: Stephanie and Arno have a romantic dinner
Stephanie wants to get intimate with Arno already
Stephanie teases Arno with a little game
145322.content:
A few days passed and the big night is here. Stephanie goes over her looks one last time. They agreed to meet on the forest's edge, where she would pick him up and take him to her home. Probably a smart call. There weren't many human places they could visit with her titanic stature and most of her usual hangouts would treat her date like a snack. She cooked up something nice for him already. Hopefully she didn't make his portion too small. With every detail of her appearance looking just as she wanted it Stephanie left her house in the mountains and went for her brisk walk to the forest's edge.

The giant took careful steps. All those trees would snap like twigs under her tread, but she didn't want to make a mess of the forest. The thought ran by to grab a deer or something as a quick snack, but she didn't work hard to make a fancy dinner just to spoil her appetite now. Why was she so nervous anyway? This was just a one night thing. With a human of all things. What danger could it possibly pose? As the sun slowly began to set she saw a single car rolling down the road, slowing down and parking just outside the woods. Human hikers started their trails there, but something told her this wasn't another hiker. Her suspicion was confirmed when a man got out and waved at her.

Arno was excited about this day. He'd always adored big girls and with just over five feet in height to his name there were plenty of those around him. But sadly he always fell short in their eyes. Now he was about to go on a date with someone so vast he could barely believe it. Seeing her towering over the treetops as he drove to their meeting point was awe-inspiring. That giant of a woman is there for him. He got out of his car and waved at her, smiling as she seemed to recognize him as her date. The ground trembled ever more with each approaching step. She kept coming closer until he feared this date might get cut short with one deadly misstep. Thankfully she stops in time, squatting down to take a closer look at her date.

"Aww, you're even more adorable in person." Stephanie cooed, speaking softly so she wouldn't hurt his tiny ears.

"Ehhehe, thank you." He stammered back. Though he was certain she had nothing but the best intentions for him, it was still intimidating as hell to stand before a woman this huge. He was no bigger than her pinky finger and he flinched as she brought her hand down, opening her palm before him.

"Go on, climb on. I'll carry you." She tried to sound encouraging, but the man seemed hesitant. He shuffled back to his car.

"Wait, I gotta grab something first." He said, opening the back door and retrieving a package. He put it in her hand and stepped back. "Here, for you."

Puzzled by this tiny gift, Stephanie lifted her hand, bringing the plain looking box to her face for a closer inspection. With all the care she could muster she pushed it open to see what looked like a chocolate cake in it. It was shaped like a heart and finished a little sloppily.

"I made it myself. I hope you like it." The man shouted from down below.

"Aww, you didn't have to." She cooed again, throwing the whole thing into her mouth. It was little more than a quick piece of candy to the giantess, but the rich taste was divine. Human chocolate just tasted so much better than the monster version. "Mmmmmm... Do you spoil all your dates, or am I lucky."

"All of them so far..." Arno added, scratching the back of his head nervously. He was a little embarrassed by the truth, but that wasn't gonna matter now. Stephanie extended her hand again and this time he got on himself. Her fingers wrapped around him, holding him firmly and leaving only his head exposed. She lifted him to her mouth and for a moment he feared he would become her next meal. Her big lips pursed and smothered his face in a sloppy kiss. The giantess wasn't shy about showing her appreciation for a man who would go this far for her.

"I can tell we're both going to enjoy tonight a lot." She mused, holding him steady as she walked back home. It only took her a few minutes to traverse what Arno was certain would be a day-long hike for him. Finally they entered the giant house in the mountains. He was surprised to see how similar it looked to his own home, all the regular things were there. They were just scaled for someone huge, which put an interesting perspective on things. Most furniture was the size of buildings to him, cupboards standing 60 stories tall. Stephanie took a seat on the couch and held up the man in her hand. Gently she released him back into her open palm, smiling from ear to ear.
145322.title: Arno Luscim, who is also eager for a night of fun

Arno slips under her shirt
Stephanie removes the choice, unbuttoning her shirt
1453223.content:
The giantess shot a quick look at the clock. Their romantic dinner was already in the oven and would need another fifteen minutes. Just enough time for a chat, or perhaps a little game.

"So tell me, Arno. Is this date everything you'd hoped it would be so far?" She cooed softly at the little man in her hand. He breathlessly nodded, awestruck by the enormous environment he found himself in. He didn't think any of this was even possible, but here she was, the biggest woman he'd ever seen. And he was on a date with her. He kept daydreaming until he noticed her lips moving again.

"Arno? Are you still with me?" Stephanie teased as she wondered what was going through his little mind. She followed his gaze and found him staring blankly at her tits. That didn't seem like a coincidence. Her button up shirt was low cut enough to give him a sneaky look at the goods. It gave her an idea for a challenge.

The man looked up to see her smiling. He knew that grin. She was up to something. Her fingers closed around him, holding him in place as she moved around on the couch. He was put down on the far side with Stephanie laying herself down along the full length. Her head was propped up by the arm rest and she spoke softly.

"If you want a kiss, you've got two minutes to get up here and collect it." She cooed, watching him burst into a mad dash towards her leg. She'd given him a reasonable amount of time in her mind. Two minutes was a long time and in spite of the unusual terrain she imagined his love would drive him forward. The first challenge would be not getting distracted. She was wearing a modest skirt, but he was between her legs being served the world's largest upskirt right now. And those black lace panties underneath didn't leave a whole lot to the imagination. To her surprise he took a second to admire it before getting back to his task. He was a man of discipline for sure.

Arno stood beside a leg thicker than he was tall. Even Stephanie's slim ankles were huge to him. The fabric of her socks let him climb on top with relative ease. He set off, running along the smooth surface of her leg. It felt weird to run on someone's body. The ground was a little yielding, like walking on a firm mattress. It made his movements look a little clumsier that he'd like, but soon he was running along her thighs. The fabric of her skirt provided slightly better footing, but he had to be careful not to slip off. Stephanie giggled a little as he reached her belly. The small gap left by her shirt meant he ran across her bare skin again, tickling her as he did. Her laughs made the already unstable ground impossible to run on, sending Arno down on all fours. He nearly slammed his face into her cute belly button.

The man stood up and look ahead at his next challenge. With only half his time remaining he'd need to navigate past her button up shirt next. There were two paths to take though. He could move to the side a little and climb onto her shirt, running over the top of it. But those magnificent breasts propped her shirt up enough for him to consider slipping underneath it. The second route would be shorter, but she might not approve of him getting into her clothes this early in their date.

info.brief_description: Adventurous humans and lonely monsters looking for love
info.description:
A new app has crept up from some dark corner of the internet promising its users the ability to date all manner of monsters, be it ancient myths and legends or other strange creatures of fantasy. Discarded mostly as a prank or some elaborate hoax, only a few people have found it so far and have given it a try. Those who took the plunge also soon discovered that monster standards for a 'date' can differ wildly from their expectations. Will they even survive their romantic encounters?

The rules:

1: Everyone involved is 18+, no underage characters
2: Gore is alright, but try not to go overboard with gratuitous descriptions
3: No Scat/watersports
4: Characters can die, but don't kill them off too quickly. Give the date a few chapters worth of story before hitting the fatal conclusion.
5: Let's avoid pre-established characters for now. Import species and such as you will, but don't haul in characters from other franchises. I may relax this rule later when there's more chapters, but for now attempt to create your own monsters and people.
6: Dates need not be straight. M/M, F/F and more are all welcome.


If you have any questions about this interactive, feel free to send me an e-mail.
